thread.title: Polluting Chinese firms face tougher environmental regulation, says MSCI
thread.title_full: Polluting Chinese firms face tougher environmental regulation, says MSCI

title: Polluting Chinese firms face tougher environmental regulation, says MSCI
text:
End date Polluting Chinese firms face tougher environmental regulation, says MSCI 
The number of penalties for commercial pollution has doubled in China, as polluting companies in the country experience "clear head winds" in the face of strengthened environmental regulation, according to a report.
